meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be shared.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness and generosity are her most valuable shareabilities.
meanings.sent2: The shareabilities of digital content make it easy to distribute online.
meanings.sent3: His shareabilities in the office are always appreciated during team projects.
meanings.sent4: The company's shareabilities in the market set them apart from competitors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's shareabilities in explaining complex topics make learning enjoyable.

meanings.definition: Things that can be easily shared with others.
meanings.sent1: The shareabilities of the new app allow users to send files effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: Sharing recipes with friends showcases the culinary shareabilities of the chef.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled with delicious shareabilities for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: The community library is a treasure trove of literary shareabilities waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The team's success was attributed to their effective shareabilities of resources and ideas.
